pages.privacy-policy: StarStage - Privacy Policy | Safeguarding Your Data and Privacy Rights StarStage HOME ABOUT US Performances CONTACT Privacy Policy This privacy policy describes how StarStage collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect Information you provide directly: This may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you submit through forms on our website. Information collected automatically: When you visit our website, we may collect certain information automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and browsing activity on our website. How We Use Your Information To provide and improve our website: We may use your information to operate and maintain our website, and to improve your user experience. To send you communications: We may use your information to send you emails about upcoming events, promotions, and other news related to StarStage. To comply with legal obligations: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws and regulations. Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who help us operate our website and provide our services. We will only disclose your information to these providers who have agreed to comply with our privacy standards. Your Choices You can opt out of receiving marketing emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those emails. You can also contact us to request access to or deletion of your personal information. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website. We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically for any updates. The StarStage website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. User Accounts You may need to create an account to access certain features of the Website. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. StarStage reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, and remove or edit content at our sole discretion. Use of the Website You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Website to: Transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive. Interfere with the security of the Website or attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Website or computer systems of StarStage or third parties. Violate any intellectual property rights of StarStage or any third party. Use the Website for any commercial purposes without our express written consent. Intellectual Property The content of the Website, including the design, text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of StarStage or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
